Follain Toning Mist Balance + Prime

Brand: Follain

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: Water/Aqua/Eau, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, 1,2-Hexanediol, Pentylene Glycol, Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Rosa Canina Fruit Extract, Moringa Oleifera Leaf Extract, Ubiquinone (CoQ10), Cryptomeria Japonic

Cryptomeria Japonica Branch/Leaf Extract, Macrocystis Pyrifera (Kelp) Extract, Glycerin, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Extract, Butylene Glycol, Galactoarabinan, Sodium PCA, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Sodium Benzoate, Xanthan Gum, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid

Directions: After cleansing, spritz freely over face and neck (eyes closed!). For be

yes closed!). For best results, follow with moisturizer while skin is still dewy. May be used throughout the day for a quick hit of hydration.

Warnings: FOR EXTERNAL USE ONLY.
